column1: Little Goat Diner////I haven't tried the food
column2: so I can't really speak to that
column3: but I did come here for a rooftop Oktoberfest party
column4: and it was great! I didn't even realize they had a rooftop
column5: but the space is really nice during the summer and I love restaurants that partner with breweries to throw fun events. The wait was pretty crazy
column8: but when we finally made it up
column9: it was well worth it. When summertime rolls around again
